thread.title: NFL Week 5 point spreads, over/under: Colts a 1-point favorite against Texans
thread.title_full: NFL Week 5 point spreads, over/under: Colts a 1-point favorite against Texans | syracuse.com

author: Hank Domin | hdomin@syracuse.com
title: NFL Week 5 point spreads, over/under: Colts a 1-point favorite against Texans
text:
The Indianapolis Colts are a one-point favorite on the road against the Houston Texans on Thursday night.
The Colts (2-2) have won two in a row after opening with losses to the Buffalo Bills and New York Jets. The Texans (1-3) beat the Tampa Bay Buccaneers for their only win.
The Bills are a 2.5-point favorite against the Tennessee Titans.
Below are the odds for NFL games next week courtesy of America's Line.
